name: Thu Duc through closed eyes
description: Ho chi minh city is so large a place to pay a visit. You might have been showed around Sai Gon, it doesn’t mean that  you witnessed the whole Ho Chi Minh city. Because Sai Gon just includes some inner districts of HCMC with the  luxurious and modern view. How about  the suburbs? How about its unique cuisines? How about its friendly local people?  Come with me and I will show you Thu Duc district-one of Ho Chi Minh city’suburbs. Let’s go!
